mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Z.ZZIM_NO, Z.ZZIM_NAME,Z.MEM_NO, ZC.PDT_NO,ZC.ZZIM_DATE,PT.PDT_THUMB_NO,PT.PDT_THUMB_IMAGE AS IMAGE, RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY Z.ZZIM_NO ORDER BY zc.zzim_date DESC ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PDT_THUMB_NO,3))ASC) AS RANKING, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZZIMCONTENT WHERE ZZIM_NO=Z.ZZIM_NO) AS COUNT FROM ZZIM Z LEFT JOIN ZZIMCONTENT ZC ON Z.ZZIM_NO=ZC.ZZIM_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_THUMB PT ON ZC.PDT_NO=PT.PDT_NO_REF WHERE Z.MEM_NO=#{memNo} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(Z.ZZIM_NO,2)) DESC )WHERE RANKING =1

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ZC.ZZIM_NO,ZC.ZZIMCONTENT_NO,ZC.ZZIM_DATE,ZC.PDT_NO, PT.PDT_THUMB_IMAGE AS zzimPdtImage,PDT_NAME AS zzimPdtName, RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY PT.PDT_NO_REF ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PT.PDT_THUMB_NO,3))) AS RANK FROM ZZIMCONTENT ZC LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_THUMB PT ON ZC.PDT_NO=PT.PDT_NO_REF LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PDT ON ZC.PDT_NO=PDT.PDT_NO ORDER BY ZC.ZZIM_DATE DESC )WHERE RANK=1 AND ZZIM_NO=#{zzimNo}
